attributes.text:
Internal class for handling of dynamic property groups. Should only be used through the methods provided by {@link qx.Class}.

For a complete documentation of properties take a look at http://qooxdoo.org/documentation/developer_manual/properties.

Property groups are defined in a similar way but support a different set of keys:

NameTypeDescription
groupString[] A list of property names which should be set using the propery group.
themeableBoolean Whether this property can be set using themes.
shorthandBoolean If enabled, the properties can be set using a CSS like shorthand mode e.g. expanding two given values into 4 applied values.
Class to add the property group to
Adds a new property group to the given class
array or arguments object with one to four elements
Expand shorthand definition to a four element list. This is an utility function for padding/margin and all other shorthand handling.
